value.name: Police: 2 North Carolina officers shoot, kill man with knife
value.description: The statement says officers were confronted by 35-year-old Alijah Jackson, who was barricaded in a bathroom. Police say the man, who is white, came out with a knife and refused to drop it.

value.name: Robert Morris beats St. Francis (PA) 20-17 in double OT
value.description: Tim Vecchio had six receptions for 94 yards and a score and Alijah Jackson had 26 carries for 110 yards for Robert Morris (2-4, 1-0 Northeast Conference). On the first possession of the second OT ...
